description: New Latin Camellia, named after Moravian botanist Joseph Kamel (‘Camellus’) (1661–1706).  The Czech surname Kamel is a variant of Kamil.

entries.meaning: Any plant of the genus Camellia, shrubs and small trees native to Asia; Camellia japonica is the most popular as a garden plant; Camellia sinensis is the tea plant.
